original_title: Du Bist Die Welt Für Mich
overview: The world’s greatest tenor presents an evening of melodies from a golden era and an engrossing documentary. Jonas dedicates an evening to the glorious tunes made famous by the tenor stars of Berlin’s legendary golden age.  Filmed live at Berlin’s majestic Funkhaus Nalepastraße.
title: Du Bist Die Welt Für Mich
